page.title: 07Mr. Wallace's farm
page.content: Mr. Wallace has a very interesting farm. He rents 267 acres of{land}but it is mostly trees and rough ground. His busiest time of year is summer. He became a farmer in 1966. He has nearly 200{animals.}80 cows 66 calves and 10 goats and 4 kids. One of the kids was not very well. Mr Wallace is helped by his wife and sometimes he gets a contractor in to help him and he does some contracting work himself. He also buys 25 tonnes of fertilizer a year. He{grows}barley,oats,turnips,kale and silage. He has two tractors one plough,harrows,rollers,grubbers,a combine harvester and a round baler. His normal working day is between 6.30 a.m to 5.00 p.m most nights.
